label: 悪党
本: Court and Bakufu in Japan:  Essays in Kamakura History . Stanford University Press . 1982
説明文: Literally, evil bands." Groups of peasants and minor warriors who perpetrated local crimes, generally looting and foraging. Became a distinct social phenomenon during the second half of the thirteenth century with implications that are much debated by historians. Other contemporary terms are akugyō, akunin, and akusō (s.v.sōhei).　[悪行、悪人、悪僧、僧兵]　[Cf. Mass, 1976.]　"
